LandingBanner.title: CREATE THE FUTURE WITH US IN
LandingBanner.description: This is a space where real-world problems are solved, and a base where theory turns into practical skills. A workshop where knowledge and skills are passed from senior generations to newcomers from the very first year.

ShortAboutUs.title: About Us
ShortAboutUs.description: SDU Technopark is an innovation hub that brings together startups, scientists, and entrepreneurs to create cutting-edge technological solutions. We provide modern infrastructure, resources, and support for the development and implementation of innovative projects in the field of software and hardware technologies...

Directions.title: What do we do?
Directions.description: You can learn about the activities of the Technopark and our projects by visiting the pages below. You can also learn more about us in the 'News' section.

hardware.title: Hardware
hardware.description: Creation and production of physical devices and components, including IoT and smart devices

software.title: Software
software.description: Development of software for various systems

dataScience.title: Data Science
dataScience.description: Data analysis and processing using machine learning and artificial intelligence to discover new solutions and optimize processes.

aboutUs.title: SDU TechnoPark
aboutUs.description: SDU TechnoPark is an innovation center located in the heart of Kaskelen, Kazakhstan. We create an ecosystem for developing new technologies, startups, and projects in science and business. Our goal is to become a platform for innovation and to train highly qualified specialists who are ready to implement tomorrow's solutions today.

mission1.title: Development of Innovative Technologies
mission1.description: We focus on supporting and implementing advanced technologies in real practice...

mission2.title: Startup Support
mission2.description: We create conditions for the successful launch and growth of innovative startups...

mission3.title: Educational Programs
mission3.description: We conduct educational events, hackathons, and workshops...

mission4.title: Business Collaboration
mission4.description: We actively collaborate with companies, providing solutions for the market...

points.point1: Development of smart devices and IoT solutions.
points.point3: Prototyping and implementation of technologies in the real sector.

points.point1: Innovative technologies: we work with the most modern development tools.
points.point2: International approach: courses and programs meet global standards.
points.point3: Practical focus: students and participants gain real experience working on projects.

points.point1: Инновациялық технологиялар: біз ең заманауи құралдармен жұмыс істейміз.
points.point2: Халықаралық тәсіл: курстар мен бағдарламалар әлемдік стандарттарға сәйкес.
points.point3: Практикалық бағыт: студенттер нақты жобаларда жұмыс тәжірибесін алады.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: We are always open to new ideas, collaborations, and questions! If you need more information or want to discuss a project, feel free to contact us.
